create.title: Generate Secret Phrase
print: DO NOT FORGET to save your mnemonic Secret Phrase. You will need your
Mnemonic Secret Phrase to restore your wallet.
Do not lose it! It cannot be recovered if you lose it.
Do not share it! Your funds will be stolen if you use this file on a phishing site.
Make a backup! Secure it like the millions of dollars it may one day be worth.

verify.title: Mnemonic words verify
verify.placeholder: Pick words here in order and recreate your secret phrase.

setup_acc.title: Account setup
setup_acc.name: An account name.
setup_acc.pass_description: A password required for encrypt your wallet.

restore.title: Restore.
restore.placeholder: Input secret words, with a space between words.

wallet_created.title: Wallet is generated!
wallet_created.subt_title: Your account has been created - Keep your secret phase safe, itâ€™s your responsibility!

tips.title: Tips on storing it safely

list.0: Save a backup in multiple places
list.1: Never share the words with anyone
list.2: Be careful of phising! bearby will never spontaneously ask for your secret phrase
list.3: If you need to back up your secret phrase again, you can find it in Security
list.4: If you ever have a question or see something fishy, contact us.

tips.warn: bearby team cannot recover your secret words!

add.title: Add account
add.description: Generate next account from secret phrase.

config.title: Node settings
config.description: All nodes are automatically updated and a few of the fastest ones are selected
config.count_description: limited by the node being used.

period.title: Period offset
period.description: The number of blocks for which a transaction should confirm.
